You Call That a Beard?

I saw this man with some lame scruff. He was bragging about his beard. I was like, “You call that a beard?”

I have to sell my dog

It is sad, but true. I am allergic to her, and my parents do not want to keep her.

I Should Have Written This Years Ago

I meant to write this back in June. Today is almost the end of July.

February is Cold, I miss Springtime

February is Cold. Here in the Midwest, we get all of the weathers. Winter sucks.

Winter Cuddles

In January, we like to cuddle, but not with our clothes off quite yet. Just wait until March!

I Failed At Christmas

Okay, let me preface this by saying that I am usually a gift-giving Ace. This year, though, I am pretty sure I made the baby Jesus cry. No gold, no Frankincense, not even merrr, myerr, muhrr. Merica? Whatever. I’m just trying to see how manu characters show up in the blog roll.

Why Did I?

So, I’ve done some silly things. Heck, I’ve done stupid things before. This might take the cake though.
